Detailed Description

Class ImageBrowserApp implements an image browser.

ServiceResult ImageBrowserApp::GetResourceNames (  Vector< Path > &  paths,
const ImageFilter &  image_filter = ImageFilter()
) 
 

GetResourceNames returns a list of paths for all available images according to the given image filter in img_filter argument. If img_filter argument is a null object, the path of all images should be returned.

Parameters:
paths The list of paths is returned in paths argument.
img_filter. The filter that should be applied for the search. If img_filter argument is a null object, the amount of all images should be returned.

void ImageBrowserApp::OnStartup (   )  [virtual]
 

ServiceResult ImageBrowserApp::SaveImage (  const Image *  image,
const Path &  path
) 
 

ONLY for EMS images SaveImage stores the image given in image argument at the location given in path argument.

Parameters:
image Image that should be stored. If image argument is a null object, the invocation should be ignored, but ServResSuccess should be returned. The image stored via this method is not DRM protected.
path Path for storing location of the image. Modification of the storage location should only be possible, if the path argument is a null object.

ServiceResult ImageBrowserApp::SaveImage (  const BinData *  raw_data,
const Path &  path,
DrmMimeType  drm_mime_type,
MimeType  mime_type
) 
 

SaveImage stores the image given in image argument at the location given in path argument.

Parameters:
image Image that should be stored. If image argument is a null object, the invocation should be ignored, but ServResSuccess should be returned.
path Path for storing location of the image. Modification of the storage location should only be possible, if the path argument is a null object. If raw_data is 0, the file given by Path would be saved into ImageBrowser
drm_mime_type Mime type for Digital Rights Management (DRM) information object for the given image. If DRM Mime type is set to DrmNone, the image is not DRM protected.
mime_type The Mime type of the image. if the mime type is unknown or invalid, mime type will be map by the extension from the path

ServiceResult ImageBrowserApp::SelectImage (  MediaRefPtr &  img_ref,
const ImageFilter &  img_filter = ImageFilter()
) 
 

SelectImage presents a list of available images filtered using img_filter argument. If no image is available, an empty list should be presented. If img_filter argument is a null object, the list of images should not be filtered.

Parameters:
img_ref If an image has been selected and the selection has been confirmed, the image is returned in img_ref argument, otherwise img_ref argument is a null object. This Service method is not re-entrant.
